Quartermaster:
So many monsters have managed to break through already, and Captain Adolph took his finest soldiers to engage them. Any operations like this will have casualties, but it`s been bad this time... bad, indeed.
I want to collect the dog tags of the dead to give to their families. It`s realy the least we can do. The only problem is, we know that they died generally in the Cemetary area, but we haven`t managed to recover any of the bodies. The fighting was most intense around the center fountain, angel statue, and stone tower, so we should look there first. I have several people on this, so please just bring me 4 dog tags from the fallen.
